name: ROC BUDDHA VISTA
main_text: The Roc Buddha branch was launched in 2021, introducing a distinct concept that blends the qualities of a restaurant with a specific emphasis on mornings.Within our branch, you will encounter our remarkable La Marzocco KB90 espresso machine, expertly operated by our skilled baristas who are passionately committed to creating the ultimate coffee experience. Furthermore, our main kitchen, known as Roc Buddha's Kitchen, proudly stands as the largest and most well-equipped kitchen within the ROC. Our primary focus lies in offering an exceptional breakfast menu that has earned a reputation as one of the finest in town.
address: Address: R.O.C. Restaurant, 1st Floor, Buddha Vista, Khan-Uul District, Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia
